folder: Union Avenue & Sylvan Place, Staten Island, NY
text:
30 Union Avenue, at the N. W. corner of Sylvan Place. The house was owned by C. Van Pelt in 1874 and by C. Hawkins in 1898 and 1907.

April 23, 1932

P. L. Sperr

folder: Union Avenue & Sylvan Place, Staten Island, NY
text:
47 Union Avenue, east side, between Sylvan Place and Forest Court. The inscription over the doorway reads: Horse shoer and blacksmith.

P. L. Sperr
April 23, 1932
